page.title: 06The Opticians,Tiptree
page.content: We went to the opticians in the shopping precinct.This is in Church Road,between Maldon Road and Factory Hill, in Tiptree and was built in the 1960s. There we interviewed a lady of about 37. It was{Don Tylers}opticians. We asked her if she minded us asking her a few questions. We got very interesting answers.These are the questions and answers. How do you think Tiptree has changed in the last 5,10,15 years? I have only lived here for seven years but I have seen several changes_more houses,different shops. Do you like Tiptree now or before? I don't really know. This was interesting to know. Did you have a job before this one? Yes,in a Playschool.She had a bit of trouble with this one. Do you like this job or the one you had before? I think I like this job best.
